name: Greek Yogurt Vinaigrette
description: This Greek Yogurt Vinaigrette is a health-conscious choice for those looking for a tasty, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar dressing option. Perfect for adding a delicious zest to your salads while keeping things light and healthy!

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and mince the garlic clove.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, whisk together the Greek yogurt, minced garlic, and cane vinegar until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Taste the vinaigrette, and adjust seasoning if necessary. If the dressing is too thick, you can thin it out with a little bit of water or more vinegar to achieve your desired consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the vinaigrette to an airtight container and refrigerate until ready to use.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
